html.p: During the first day at sea, you need food to keep yourself warm against the freezing chill of the north wind; you must eat a meal. As dusk begins to fall, there is a commotion on deck as a lookout yells, 'Greels! Two of 'em on the port side!' You soon find out what a Greel is, when a metre-thick, white-furred neck lunges over the port bow and a brutish, eel-like head darts towards you. The beast opens its black-lipped mouth to display rows of backward-pointing teeth as long as daggers. You must fight for your life!
